### <mark> EXERCISE 2.1; Setup a Github repo for Lesson 2 - Agile/SCRUM </mark> {-}

A) Start by setting up an account on Github.com if you do not already have one.

B) Activate 2-factor authentication (follow the steps here: https://docs.github.com/en/free-pro-team@latest/github/authenticating-to-github/configuring-two-factor-authentication)

C) Create a new github repository in your personal account called `wf-agile-scrum`
